sentences: Kolmanda päeva hommikul tuli meile uus mängija.
Kolmanda maailmasõja alguses oli ta alles noor.
context: The word 'kolmanda' in Estonian is the genitive case of the ordinal number 'kolmas', which means 'third'. It is commonly used to indicate something that belongs to or is related to the third item in a sequence or series.
